H0.text: An electron is the smallest particle of an element that still exhibits all the properties of that element.

H1.text: An atom is the smallest particle of an element that still exhibits all the properties of that element.

H2.text: A molecule is the smallest particle of an element that still exhibits all the properties of that element.

H3.text: A proton is the smallest particle of an element that still exhibits all the properties of that element.

A4.text: Atoms are the basic particles of the chemical elements and the fundamental building blocks of matter.
